title: The Vagina Whisperer, Dr. Amir Marashi On Vagina Makeovers, How To Orgasm, Labiaplasty, & Women's Rights
itunes:title: The Vagina Whisperer, Dr. Amir Marashi On Vagina Makeovers, How To Orgasm, Labiaplasty, & Women's Rights
description:
#485: On today's episode we are joined by "The Vagina Whisperer" aka Dr. Amir Marashi. Dr. Marashi is a board certified gynecoligist specializing in labiaplasty, vaginoplasty, pelvic pain, and endometriosis. Dr. Marashi joins the show today to discuss what a vagina makeover process can look like, we also discuss how to orgasm, the best sex postions, and women's rights.
